title: Information Literacy Assessment Competency Enhancement: Rubric-Based Formative Assessment Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Focused on enhancing language-integrated information evaluation skills for pre-service/in-service teachers, with LMS-based activities conducted in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners can utilize rubrics to evaluate information sources appropriate for academic purposes
Learners can self-assess information-seeking habits through annotated bibliography assignments
Learners can diagnose information literacy deficit areas and develop improvement plans based on rubric feedback

resources: Access rights to digital information source databases

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
